short_summary: public rfx SSC public rfx - Amendment 000
full_summary:
================================
### Government Tender Announcement

 Shared Services Canada is soliciting responses for a public request for proposal under Solicitation Number: **BPM018309/22008**.

### Request Details

* **Public RFX Reference Number:** SSC-23-00022008:T
* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de Propositions)
* **G SIN Code:** 5111A (Planification de chantier de construction)
* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **Contracting Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada

### Submission and Evaluation Criteria

The Request for Proposal (RFP) will be conducted in English, and all submissions should be made in this official language to Shared Services Canada by the designated closing date as outlined below.

* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-20T10:00:00
* **Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Specific evaluation criteria will be outlined in the RFP document and will focus on aspects relevant to public procurement.

### Supporting Information

* **Governing Documents:** SSC22-RFX-014193 / Amendment Number 000
* **Tender Documents:** Available upon request

### Contact Information for Assistance

Should you require any assistance or clarification regarding this tender announcement, contact:
  Ryan, Ho (ADMIN)
   Email: [noreply@ssc-spc.gc.ca ](mailto:noreply@ssc-spc.gc.ca ) 
    Phone: (343) 542 2049

Note that all official information and submission can be accessed on the government procurement website.

**The final version will have formatted text.** 

. (User Already notified)
Keep either bullet or ordered list to properly illustrated the list which contains announcement information.
